summary: In this context, nitrate is mentioned as a source of available nitrogen nutrients in the preparation of a PVA/peat composite bead. Potassium nitrate (KNO3) serves as the inorganic nitrogen source, indicating that nitrate is a form of nitrogen that can be utilized in the biofilter material. The relationship highlights the role of nitrate in providing essential nitrogen for biological processes, particularly in the context of enhancing VOC removal efficiency.
